description:
The solution has arrived from the future: the real bullet Karin was supposed to hit Junta with! The DNA Operator lures Junta to the roof of the school building, where she lines up her shot. But fate intervenes, as Tomoko and Ryuji, arguing over their relationship, are also on the roof. Karin takes her shot--but does it work?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ma il proiettile colpisce il petto di Ryuji...
Sono Dangan wa Ryuuji no Mune ni...
その弾丸は竜二の胸に...
